posts.post_content: Most of you are reading this card wrong. It's not a 5/5 for ![6](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=6&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) with a drawback; it's a 2/2 for ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol) with an overpriced pump ability. Just the fact that it has Morph makes it strictly better than [Pearled Unicorn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pearled Unicorn) or [Raging Bull](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Raging Bull), both of which are rated higher than this. It's bad, but it's not *that* bad.
posts.html:
Most of you are reading this card wrong. It's not a 5/5 for with a drawback; it's a 2/2 for with an overpriced pump ability. Just the fact that it has Morph makes it strictly better than Pearled Unicorn or Raging Bull, both of which are rated higher than this. It's bad, but it's not that bad.
